blogPost.title: The US housing boom continues with prices hitting all-time highs again, up 11.2% over the past year. This is the highest YoY increase since 2006. https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 美国房市热潮仍在继续，房价再创历史新高，过去一年上涨11.2%。这是自2006年以来最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。
美國房市熱潮仍在繼續，房價再創歷史新高，過去一年上漲11.2%。這是自2006年以來最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。

previous.title: Bright Side Of Short Selling: GameStop, Tesla, And Beyond..."GameStop's share price has experienced large swings in recent months. If short sellers are unable to borrow and short the company's stock, there is a possibility that the price level only reflects the opinion of bullish investors..."

localize.title: Bright Side Of Short Selling。GameStop、特斯拉及其他...... "最近几个月，GameStop的股价经历了大幅波动。如果卖空者无法借道做空该公司的股票，有可能价格水平只反映了看涨投资者的意见......"
Bright Side Of Short Selling。GameStop、特斯拉及其他...... "最近幾個月，GameStop的股價經歷了大幅波動。如果賣空者無法借道做空該公司的股票，有可能價格水平只反映了看漲投資者的意見......"
